Descriptions.TotalDefense: You can defend yourself as a standard action. You get a +4 dodge bonus to your AC for 1 round. Your AC improves at the start of this action. You can’t combine total defense with fighting defensively or with the benefit of the Combat Expertise feat. You can’t make attacks of opportunity while using total defense.
Descriptions.FightingDefensively: You can choose to fight defensively when attacking. If you do so, you take a –4 penalty on all attacks in a round to gain a +2 dodge bonus to AC for 1 round.

ContextNotes.TotalDefense1: Total Defense cannot be combined with Combat Expertise.
ContextNotes.TotalDefense2: Cannot make AoO due to Total Defense.
